Santhosh Kumar Ramakrishnan

Research Assistant at The University of Texas at Austin

Gates Dell Complex

2317 Speedway, Austin, TX 78712

I am a Ph.D. student in the Department of Computer Science at UT Austin, advised by Dr. Kristen Grauman. My primary research interests include Computer Vision, Reinforcement Learning and their intersection.

Before joining UT Austin in 2017, I completed my integrated B.Tech and M.Tech at IIT Madras. I was jointly advised by Dr. Anurag Mittal and Dr. Gaurav Sharma for my M.Tech thesis.
